name: Lonely Rover (MoonsPod)
description:
You are a Lonely Rover on an empty planet whose duty is to collect as much Junk as possible for your creators. One day you decide enough is enough, you're tired of being alone and decide to seek out something or someone else on this planet, but traveling far is difficult on a small battery, you'll have to be careful.

If the Rover moves too slow for your taste, you can make it faster in the options on the main menu :)

Please check out my friends stuff, she did basically all of the art, consider commissioning something: Kiamyyumi/Amy

Created for Gogodot Jam 2
